alert.note: Alert for Cobb; DeKalb; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:54PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern DeKalb, east central Cobb and central Fulton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 754 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Chastain Memorial Park, or 9 miles east of Marietta, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Smyrna, Dunwoody, Chamblee, Doraville, North Atlanta, Mount Bethel, Vinings, Brookhaven, Bolton, and Chastain Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
